text:
="preserve">Matti Samuel Laakso (23 March 1939 – 3 November 2020) was a Finnish wrestler. He competed in the 1960 Summer Olympics, in the 1964 Summer Olympics, and in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Ilmajoki, Finland. His younger brother was wrestler Martti Laakso.
Laakso died on 3 November 2020 in Ilmajoki at the age of 81.
